name: WEB SLINGER
description:
UPDATE : 1/31/2021 several players were unable to trigger the end boss due to growing the web out too large. We will address this issue after the Jam, so if you would like to experience the boss We recommend not building out more than 2 times to get the full experience. Thank you for your understanding in this minor build issue. 

Note : This Game is made for BlackThrownProd 3rd Game Jam.

Survive an onslaught of bugs 

Web Slinger, an action packed garden adventure.

 Take control of a spider who is defending his web. Catch flies, beetles, and ladybugs to eat and grow your web!

The less you move the more web fluid you will have to grow your web and evade enemies.

 

Made by TEAM SPIDER :

@Thethispointer - Programmer

@AbhiTechGames - Programmer & Game Designer @IAMPENNDRAGON- Artist, Game Designer

 @SavestateCorrupted - Sound Design, Composer@ElectricIceBird - Programme
